mapper.select: select u.id, u.username, u.password, u.nick_name, u.salt, u.token, u.is_deleted, u.gmt_create, u.gmt_modified, aur.role_id from acl_user u inner join acl_user_role aur on u.id = aur.user_id
mapper.insert: insert into acl_user (id, username, password, nick_name, salt, token, is_deleted, gmt_create, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{id},#{username},#{password},#{nickName},#{salt},#{token},#{isDelete},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
mapper.update:
update acl_user
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
nickname = #{nickName},
salt = #{salt},
token = #{token},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified},
where id = #{id}
